Articles.Content:
There is no weather in KSP so things like kerbal kites or kerbal gliders wont work properly .

Also things like clouds can't be added without this.
Clouds can be added, they just won't be realistic. See EVE.

What kind of weather would be a good addition to the game?

Real life rockets have to delay if weather is even a little bad, that doesn’t seem like it adds much fun .
